entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbgshim is broken in .NET 6.0-rc1 Windows X86 #60215
  • Ship runtime using DllImportGenerator #60212
    7.0.0
  • Input SerialPort binary byte value 17 Hex (11) omits the byte and the frame is cut #60209
    Future

Closed

  • Unable to build CLR: error: assigning to 'var_types' from incompatible type 'unsigned char' #60221
  • how to run c# console exe switch to use mono interpreter runtime? #60213
  • CancellationTokenSource is hard to use correctly #29970
    Future
  • Remove Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy in .NET 7 early previews #55196
    7.0.0
  • Directory.GetFiles is very slow on linux with NFS share #59947
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DeleteOnClose.OpenOrCreate_DeleteOnClose_UsableAsMutex #60210
  • User's secrets are not used in the new templates in Net 6 RC1 #59745
    6.0.0
  • On Linux, FileShare.None doesn't seem to be taken into account when retrying to open a locked file #59995
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Improve node stats reporting #60223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure attributes are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Backport of changes to support x64 on arm64 #60208
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Fix GetGenerationWithRange when we have a gen 2 object in the ephemeral segment (#60189) #60207
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix a build break #60222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ISMETHOD and ISMETHODHASH macros #59993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updates to DllImportGenerator docs #60211
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove `Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy`. #57735
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60132
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting

Updated

  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [reflection] Return n2m wrapper from RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer #60200
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Process cancelled tasks from SerialStream.Unix read/write request queues when a timeout occurs #55188
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update docs for PipeReader.TryRead #52237
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047
